lead_paragraph: Russia will compete in the majority of sports at the Rio Olympics with 271 competitors taking part, Russian Olympic chief Alexander Zhukov told a news conference in the host city on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Russia to Compete in Most Rio Events : Russian Olympic Chief
headline.main: Russia to Compete in Most Rio Events : Russian Olympic Chief

snippet: Russia will compete in the majority of sports at the Rio Olympics with 271 competitors taking part, Russian Olympic chief Alexander Zhukov told a news conference in the host city on Thursday....
